holidays.title: National Tapioca Day
holidays.description: We’re bubbling with excitement to tell you about this less popular - though no less delicious - carb.

holidays.title: Christopher Street Day
holidays.description: Wear your rainbow t-shirt, step onto the street, and march to celebrate the pride of love.

holidays.title: Constitution Day (Ukraine)
holidays.description: Let’s unite together to learn about the history and customs on Constitution Day (Ukraine)!

holidays.title: Cream Tea Day
holidays.description: Share a pot of tea with jam and cream-coated scones with your loved ones today.

holidays.title: Drive Your Corvette to Work Day
holidays.description: Hit the brakes on all other celebrations while we appreciate a widely popular car.

holidays.title: Family Day in Vietnam
holidays.description: Let’s rejoice together and enhance our capacity for the true joy that family brings!

holidays.title: Matariki
holidays.description: We’re taking a starry ride to New Zealand to celebrate a holiday like no other.

holidays.title: National Climate-Smart Skin Awareness Day
holidays.description: They say that beautiful skin requires commitment, not a miracle. So, let’s take care of it!

holidays.title: National Food Truck Day
holidays.description: Grab a snack from your local food truck and support the entrepreneurs behind them.

holidays.title: National Insurance Awareness Day
holidays.description: Insurance is one of those things we forget about until we need it.

holidays.title: National Lauren Day
holidays.description: Join us as we figure out why we’re celebrating Laurens this National Lauren Day!

holidays.title: National Logistics Day
holidays.description: Be amazed at how the logistics industry works round the clock to keep the economy running.

holidays.title: Paul Bunyan Day
holidays.description: Revisit the Paul Bunyan craze with our fun and folklore filled-article.

holidays.title: St. Vitus Day
holidays.description: Today, the Serbian Orthodox Church commemorates the martyrs of the 1389 Battle of Kosovo.

holidays.title: Stonewall Riots Anniversary
holidays.description: Appreciate the efforts of all Stonewall heroes by celebrating this iconic day.

holidays.title: Tau Day
holidays.description: Tau is considered more accurate than pi, despite pi’s popularity.

holidays.title: Vincy Mas in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
holidays.description: With costumes, parades, food, and lots of music let's celebrate Vincy Mas in style!

holidays.title: Wimbledon
holidays.description: The London-based event takes place on grass — the only Grand Slam event to do so.

holidays.title: Diamond Strawberry’s Birthday
holidays.description: No more drama. Today is all about celebrating Diamond Strawberry’s special day.

holidays.title: Elon Musk’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the most successful entrepreneur alive, the sky is not the limit. His projects reach space.

holidays.title: John Elway’s Birthday
holidays.description: It’s a touchdown and a home run for this remarkable and iconic American athlete.

holidays.title: Katelyn Elizabeth’s Birthday
holidays.description: A TikTok star with millions of followers, Katelyn Elizabeth’s lovely personality has won everyone’s hearts.

holidays.title: Markiplier’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about this top YouTube content creator and famous internet personality.

holidays.title: Mel Brooks’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actor and filmmaker has always been funny and has the perfect comic timing!
